name: Cutman's Nightmare (A Arthur's Nightmare Mod)
description: Story: You (a burglar) Has broken in to Cutman's Crib and want to steal his Kirbys. But you can carry 10 Kirbys at a time and you want 40 Kirbys by the end of the week. But it won't be easy cuz CutMan and his homies want those kirbys and they will rape you report to the police. Get them Kirbs then get out of the house to win!
